Description: Fabulous East Side 1 bed 1 bath condo has it all! Features include open floor plan with granite/SS kitchen, high ceilings, HW floors, lots of natural light, newly renovated bath with white marble glass shower, in unit W/D, and central AC. Perfectly placed blocks from the beach, castle island, E Broadway shops & restaurants and a great commute to the Seaport, Downton! Available 10/1 possibly sooner. Pets allowed. First/security/fee due at signing.
